# Rober González - Portfolio Website

> Personal portfolio and resume website for Rober González, a Senior Product Designer specializing in AI product design, agentic & systems UX, and user-centered design.

## Overview

This is a professional portfolio website hosted at rober.design. It showcases design work and includes practical tools demonstrating design and development skills.

## Main Sections

- **Homepage** (`/index.html`): Portfolio landing page with bio, skills grid, and side projects
- **Resume/CV Tool** (`/cv/`): Custom markdown-based resume generator with print-ready PDF output
- **Bookmarks Lite** (`/bookmarks/`): Minimalist bookmarks manager application

## Technical Stack

- Vanilla HTML, CSS, JavaScript (no frameworks)
- Custom CSS with CSS variables, responsive design, animations
- GitHub Pages hosting

## Key Features

- Dark/light mode toggle with localStorage persistence
- Responsive grid layouts
- Smooth scroll and parallax effects
- Print-optimized resume generation
- Accessible HTML with semantic structure

## File Structure

- `/index.html` - Main portfolio homepage
- `/cv/` - Resume tool with custom markdown parser
- `/bookmarks/` - Bookmarks lite application
- `/404.html` - Custom error page

## Contact

Website: https://rober.design
